price: 6. Waxay rag ku jira dadka magan galayeen rag ku jira jinka, markaasay u kordhiyeen dhib iyo culeys (denbi).
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna rijālun mina al-insi yaʿūdhūna birijālin mina al-jini fazādūhum rahaqan
